title: Game crashes after every game played and 8/10 times when opening the lol patcher.
body: Seriously riot come on. I thought that the patches would fix it but no. Also my 'home' screen never loads. Its just forever loading which is also shame.

replies.body:
Hey there,

That definitely sounds odd, could you do the following for me.

* [Repair your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6).
* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5).

Let me know if the above resolved either of your issues, if not we can explore further potential solutions.
Nevermind. Its started crashing again. Tried to open it after it crashed after a game and its just crashing constantly now.

Hmm, that's odd.

Was there an intermediary patch before it started crashing? If so, the patch may have downloaded incorrectly. Could you try another repair for me and let me know if that helps?

If there was not a patch in between the first repair and now, I'm going to need you to download the [hextech toolkit](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/HTK_Setup.msi), install it, select your region and run with the default settings. A file should be saved to your desktop called **LoL-Logs.zip**, please upload this file somewhere (mega.co.nz would be my choice) and link it here.
Looks to be good, havent had a maestro failure, crash as of yet.

Just repaired the client. So far so good. I finally have my home screen back, havent seen that for quite a while.
Im gonna play a few games and see if it crashes.
(I dislike the crashing cause i run a facebook page where i post game results on.)
